column6: - It's Nomad's last stand. As the Scarecrow's terror pheromone has taken Captain America's mind... But that's really the least of his worries. - What does it take to scare a man who grew up in a Dimension of boogie men?
column8: | penciller (cover):Simone Bianchi | writer:Dennis Hopeless | artist:Szymon Kudranski
